bug.author: azhar-autocanvas
bug.summary: please add .strip() to remove trailing new lines caused by data preparation. All the images go to corrupted count due to this
bug.description:
yolov5/utils/datasets.py
Line 453 in 97a5227
l = np.array([x.split() for x in f.read().splitlines()], dtype=np.float32) # labels

comments.comment:
Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/azhar-autocanvas>@azhar-autocanvas</denchmark-link> , thank you for your interest in YOLOv5! Please visit our <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/wiki#tutorials>Tutorials</denchmark-link> to get started, where you can find quickstart guides for simple tasks like <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/wiki/Train-Custom-Data>Custom Data Training</denchmark-link> all the way to advanced concepts like <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/issues/607>Hyperparameter Evolution</denchmark-link> . If this is a üêõ Bug Report, please provide screenshots and minimum viable code to reproduce your issue, otherwise we can not help you. If this is a custom training Question, please provide as much information as possible, including dataset images, training logs, screenshots, and a public link to online <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/wiki/Train-Custom-Data#visualize>W&B logging</denchmark-link> if available. For business inquiries or professional support requests please visit <denchmark-link:https://www.ultralytics.com>https://www.ultralytics.com</denchmark-link> or email Glenn Jocher at <denchmark-link:mailto:glenn.jocher@ultralytics.com>glenn.jocher@ultralytics.com</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-h:h2>Requirements</denchmark-h>
Python 3.8 or later with all <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/blob/master/requirements.txt>requirements.txt</denchmark-link> dependencies installed, including . To install run: $ pip install -r requirements.txt <denchmark-h:h2>Environments</denchmark-h>
YOLOv5 may be run in any of the following up-to-date verified environments (with all dependencies including <denchmark-link:https://developer.nvidia.com/cuda>CUDA</denchmark-link> /<denchmark-link:https://developer.nvidia.com/cudnn>CUDNN</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://www.python.org/>Python</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://pytorch.org/>PyTorch</denchmark-link> preinstalled):
Google Colab Notebook with free GPU: Kaggle Notebook with free GPU: https://www.kaggle.com/ultralytics/yolov5 Google Cloud Deep Learning VM. See GCP Quickstart Guide Docker Image https://hub.docker.com/r/ultralytics/yolov5. See Docker Quickstart Guide
<denchmark-h:h2>Status</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/workflows/CI%20CPU%20testing/badge.svg></denchmark-link>
If this badge is green, all <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/actions>YOLOv5 GitHub Actions</denchmark-link> Continuous Integration (CI) tests are currently passing. CI tests verify correct operation of YOLOv5 training (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/blob/master/train.py>train.py</denchmark-link> ), testing (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/blob/master/test.py>test.py</denchmark-link> ), inference (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/blob/master/detect.py>detect.py</denchmark-link> ) and export (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/blob/master/models/export.py>export.py</denchmark-link> ) on MacOS, Windows, and Ubuntu every 24 hours and on every commit.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/azhar-autocanvas>@azhar-autocanvas</denchmark-link> hi thanks for the suggestion. Can you please submit a PR with your recommended changes? Thank you!

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/azhar-autocanvas>@azhar-autocanvas</denchmark-link> this suggestion has been implemented in PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ultralytics/yolov5/pull/1551>#1551</denchmark-link> . Thank you for your contributions!
